name: Wordy (Ahmedabuajamiah)
description:
In this game "Wordy" you will have to collect letters from the maps to get a word that describes an adjective that affects ur size abilities and more ! 

For now it is a prototype for Brackeys GameJam2021.1

If the game saw some love i ll continue it :) Enjoy

Update Very Important :: I discovered a bug that will make lvl 4 impossible to win :( sorry for that but this is what happen when u work under tons of stress :(:(:(:(:( 

after the jam the game will be fixed and for sure will be fun to play .

sorry for that , cause the game have 3 environments :The forest , a city , and the funniest , an indoor environment . sorry for that.
